actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution waiving section 402(a) of Congressional Budget Act with respect to the consideration of S.J.Res. 103.

summary.text: Waives provisions of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 restricting the consideration of appropriation legislation to a May 15 deadline with respect to the consideration of S.J. Res. 203, continuing the authority of the Commissioner of Education to insure loans under the guaranteed student loan program during the transition quarter.

titles.title: A resolution waiving section 402(a) of Congressional Budget Act with respect to the consideration of S.J.Res. 103.
